snippet: RAUCH--Esther Buchholz. Born 1927 in Germany, escaped 1939 on Kindertransport, died March 10 in New York City, survived by her son Roland, her brother Bernard, her nephews David and Phillip, and her cousin James Reiss. 1/3
lead_paragraph: RAUCH--Esther Buchholz. Born 1927 in Germany, escaped 1939 on Kindertransport, died March 10 in New York City, survived by her son Roland, her brother Bernard, her nephews David and Phillip, and her cousin James Reiss. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  RAUCH, ESTHER BUCHHOLZ
